text: "Shotta Flow" is the first single off of American rapper NLE Choppa's first extended play Cottonwood. The song was released on January 17, 2019. There is also a remix that features American rapper Blueface, it was the second single to the EP. Since releasing the song, Choppa has made many sequels of the song. The song was able to make it to #14 on the Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs, #19 on the Rolling Stone Top 100, and #36 on the Billboard Hot 100 charts. It was also certified 5× Platinum by Music Canada. The original was certified 3× Platinum and the remix was certified 2× Platinum by the Recording Industry Association of America (RIAA). In the song, Choppa raps about carrying big guns and how he will pull up with his gang to kill anybody messing with them. A music video for the song was released. In the video, Choppa carries a gun and raps in front a house with his friends. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2019 songs Category:Trap songs
title: Shotta Flow
